description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. (snipped for brevity)
full_summary:
# Communications Intercept Suite Upgrade (CISU) Equipment Buy

## Solicitation No. W8472-235887/A
### Posting Date: May 19, 2023
#### Close Date: July 7, 2023 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time

The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for the Communications Intercept Suite Upgrade (CISU) equipment from qualified suppliers. This solicitation will be awarded based on lowest price.

**Specifications:**
- Item 1: Electrical Equipment Cabinet, NSN 5975-01-653-3741 ( Qty 1 );
- Item 2: Antenna Accessory Kit, NSN 5985-01-619-6709 ( Qty 1 );
- Item 3: Cable Assembly, Special Purpose Electrical, NSN 5995-01-623-3379 ( Qty 2);
- Item 4: Cable Assembly, Radio Frequency Brnached, NSN 5995-01-624-7332 ( Qty 2);
- Item 5: Cable Assembly, Radio Frequency, NSN 5995-01-624-7334 (Qty 2);
- (Optional) Item 6: Electrical Equipment Cabinet, NSN 5975-01-653-3741 (Qty 2).

**Deliver to:**
- Department of National Defence - Base Commander, CFB Esquimalt, BLDG 66, Wilfret Road, Colwood, Victoria, British Columbia, Canada, V9C 1B0

**Tender Requirements:**
- Bid submission deadline: July 7, 2023, 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time;
- Bid submission method: Online via Canada Buys.

**Attachments:**
[Files]

**Evaluation:**
This Bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price. The Bid will be evaluated as follows:
  - Arrangement, price, and conditions of delivery;
  - Responsibility and financial standing of the Bidder;

**Contact Information:**
Jay Carr, Contracting Authority
Email: [Jay.Carr@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Jay.Carr@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 548-8106

**Disclaimer:**
Please ensure you check the Bid preparations and guidelines carefully before submitting your proposal.

<<Note to editor>>, Canada Buys allows public access to tender documents for Free [https://www.canadabuys.gc.ca](https://www.canadabuys.gc.ca
